definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: The potential of oils as new types of larvicides for the control of mosquitoes are explored.
sentences.chinese: 这两种油品可开发用作防治蚊虫的新型杀幼虫药剂。

sentences.english: The period after anthesis to bagging was the key period in chemical control.
sentences.chinese: 药剂防治的关键时期是花后至果实套袋前。

sentences.english: This medicine has advantages such as a persistent effect.
sentences.chinese: 药剂具有持效期长等优点。

sentences.english: We would like to provide the new technique and relevant medicament .
sentences.chinese: 我们愿意提供新技术和配套药剂。

sentences.english: But in the last 8 weeks - yes. I had a hepatitis A booster .
sentences.chinese: 但是在过去的8个月，我用过甲型肝炎辅助药剂。

sentences.english: Conclusion To the best of pharmacologists and equipment ability.
sentences.chinese: 结论最大限度发挥药剂人员和设备的能力。

sentences.english: The first bird to eat this repellant move about nervously and frightening away the rest.
sentences.chinese: 第一只鸟吃了这种药剂后就会乱跳飞鸣把其它鸟吓走。

sentences.english: A chemical-free method to treat bed bugs.
sentences.chinese: 一个零化学药剂的扑灭臭重新方法。

sentences.english: Chavigny, of course, the King, and also my apothecary and myself.
sentences.chinese: 夏维尼，国王，药剂师和我自己。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To introduce the applications of textile technologies in pharmaceutics.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍纺织技术在药剂学中的应用。

sentences.english: The research aimed to study the effects of several herbicides to Juncellus serotinus.
sentences.chinese: 探讨几种药剂防除直播稻田水三棱草的效果。

sentences.english: It is suitable to use 1500 times diluents in the field.
sentences.chinese: 该药剂田间使用以1500倍液为宜。

sentences.english: It is a printing and dyeing mill effluent decolorization for precipitation of a new type of pharmaceutical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 它是一种针对印染厂污水的脱色沉淀治理的新型药剂。

sentences.english: The laser initiation test for several common explosive initiator compositions has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 对常用几种火工品药剂激光感度进行了试验研究。

sentences.english: They believed that the physic could stop your diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信这药剂能够止泻。

sentences.english: METHODS The responsibility which the pharmacy should do in hospital infection management was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法对医院感染管理中药剂科承担的职责进行分析。

definition: Yaksu in North Korea, near the border with Liaoning and Jiling province
to compound (medicines etc)/to prepare (by mixing ingredients)/to concoct
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon
